definition: the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]

sentences.english: Thermal fleece lining with a spun-wool sock to keep your toes nice and cozy.
sentences.chinese: 熱與紡羊毛襪，保持你的腳趾美好而舒適的羊毛襯裏。

sentences.english: If you have varicose veins, consider wearing elastic support hose.
sentences.chinese: 如果患了靜脈曲張，可以考慮穿彈力護腿襪。

sentences.english: This is your football sock. Where is the other one?
sentences.chinese: 這是你的足球襪，另外一隻在哪裏？

sentences.english: When I try on shoes, he stuff my cartoon-themed socks in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 試鞋時，他把我的卡通襪疊疊塞進上衣口袋。

sentences.english: When I try on the shoes, he put my cartoon socks in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 試鞋時，他把我的卡通襪疊疊塞進上衣口袋。

sentences.english: She tested five pairs of yoga socks and found herself slipping consistently.
sentences.chinese: 他測試了5雙瑜伽襪，發現總是打滑。

sentences.english: He save your cartoon socks in his pocket when you are trying new shoes.
sentences.chinese: 試鞋時，他把你的卡通襪疊好塞進上衣口袋。

sentences.english: My mother is darning Bob's socks.
sentences.chinese: 我母親正在給鮑勃補短襪。

sentences.english: Gloves and boots are also important, as are well-fitting socks.
sentences.chinese: 手套和靴子也很重要，因爲良好的擬合襪。

sentences.english: A pair of American Apparel tube socks. See here.
Pile socks with a sweater create quite a feel of Japanese style.
sentences.chinese: 堆堆襪搭配毛衣，別有一番日系感覺。

sentences.english: Children all over the world continue the tradition of hanging Christmas stockings.
sentences.chinese: 後來，世界各地的孩子們都繼承了懸掛聖誕襪的傳統。

sentences.english: Wear cotton or wool socks, which will help keep your feet dry.
sentences.chinese: 穿棉或羊毛襪，幫助你的腳保持乾燥。

sentences.english: In spot perambulate , discovered the footmark of similar socks.
sentences.chinese: 現場勘查中，發現了類似着襪的足跡。

sentences.english: Let traffic policemen wear black cotton gloves.
sentences.chinese: 讓交通警員戴上黑色的棉手襪。

sentences.english: There are socks for special purposes: athletic socks, crew socks etc.
sentences.chinese: 有一些短襪子有特殊的用途，如運動襪，水手襪等。

definition: crotch/seat of a pair of trousers
